comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

In the start up options, there should be an option to open only tabs which have been made "app tabs" on start up. I would like the tabs I constitute as ones I use often enough to "app" them to open on start up in place of a homepage.

The option should fall back to loading the homepage if there are no app tabs to load.

Reproducible: Always
